metadata.name: A Seat at the table
metadata.description:
This reflects the difficulties I encountered while creating digital art; although opportunities often appeared to slip by, the "when" moment was always approaching.

Most people are likely familiar with the expression "having a place at the table."  
The table has come to represent authority, bartering, and credibility as a means of advancing one's career. We long for the window to be in the spotlight, but it's always crucial to recognise the people who helped you get there.

A work produced for an exhibition at the renowned Tate Modern Gallery in London as part of a partnership between Instagram and myself for Metaâ€™s Creator Week 2022.
